titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to permit the next of kin of a deceased veteran to designate the style of flag to be furnished at the burial of such veteran.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Permits the next of kin of a deceased veteran to designate the style of flag, draped or mounted, to be furnished at the burial of such veteran.
